item.title: Lindsay add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Lindsay add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Life isn't finding shelter in the storm. It's about learning to dance in the rain." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Lindsay add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Lindsay add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Lindsay add a quote by Andrew Wolfe
item.description: "A book without words is like love without a kiss; it's empty." -- Andrew Wolfe

item.title: Lindsay add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud. It is not rude, it is not self-seeking, it is not easily angered, it keeps no record of wrongs. Love does not delight in evil but rejoices with the truth. It always protects, always trusts, always hopes, always perseveres." -- Anonymous

item.title: Lindsay add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Everyone should be able to do one card trick, tell two jokes, and recite three poems, in case they are ever trapped in an elevator." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Lindsay add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Lindsay add a quote by Modest Mouse
item.description: "Music is to the soul what words are to the mind." -- Modest Mouse

item.title: Lindsay add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Women are meant to be loved, not to be understood." -- Oscar Wilde
